text:
Are there any plans for Ant to support keytool?
I've seen most of the other standard Java 
programs (javac, jar, jarsigner, etc) incorporated into ant already.

Thanks!
Dave
creator: dbadia@carolina.rr.com
stockall@magma.ca
text:
<genkey> supports the '-genkey' option of 'keytool' it could probably be
enhanced to support other options if you want to do more then generate keys.

Jesse
